values.name: Very Low
values.description: Error, accident, or act of nature is highly unlikely to occur; or occurs less than once every 10 years.

values.name: Low
values.description: Error, accident, or act of nature is unlikely to occur; or occurs less than once a year, but more than once every 10 years.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: Error, accident, or act of nature is somewhat likely to occur; or occurs between 1-10 times a year.

values.name: High
values.description: Error, accident, or act of nature is highly likely to occur; or occurs between 10-100 times a year.

values.name: Very High
values.description: Error, accident, or act of nature is almost certain to occur; or occurs more than 100 times a year.
